page.title: 10The People of Fyfield.
page.content: Over half the people have lived here for more than 11 years. Most move here because they prefer country life or because of their work. There are few young people. The usual age_range is between 35 and 60. Village life sees few changes. People remember national occasions like the Queen's Silver Jubilee rather than local ones. Most people are happy with local {amenities,}but some need better transport facilities for people with- out cars, and more social events for the elderly and young. {Television}is the main entertainment. A small number of people do not watch much, because working on the land or with animals leaves little spare time. Many disliked so many American and repeated programmes.
